website_summaries.verdict: This budget-friendly reel tops the pack in value but also impresses with how well it keeps its rugged hose neat and orderly. It's the one to get if you want both quality and value.
pros: An excellent deal, thanks to its sturdy craftsmanship,  3/8 in
x 50 ft. polymer hose and affordable price
Earns praise for smooth retraction that rarely fails
cons: Not quite built for professional level use, but it provides features and reliability that suit most users' needs

customer_reviews.title: Have had for only 7 months & it broke  ***UPDATED - Seller has replied with promise to ship a replacement
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I was promptly contacted by the seller (Great Circle USA) and they have immediately agreed to ship a replacement. They are examining the photos with QC team to investigate if this is an isolated incident or not. So FAR, so GOOD as they seem to be standing behind the warranty - I will UPDATE on final resolution. I have used it only 2-3 times a month in a home workshop and the internal hose guide bracket (plastic) has broken into several pieces. Just contacted seller for warranty replacement....until it is resolved, I CAN NOT recommend. Was highly satisfied until this happened. Will UPDATE later on resolutions
customer_reviews.author: TLU7701

customer_reviews.title: Does not retract
customer_reviews.text: The part that is supposed to slide from side to side so the hose wraps evenly does not move at all. I called Reelworks a week ago, left a message, and have not received a return call. I also bought an electrical retractor which works ok, not great. Never buying anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar A. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Ratcheting system broke
customer_reviews.text: After having the hose reel for 12 months and 18 days, the ratcheting system broke. So now the hose wont stay extended which renders this basically useless. I've probably used the hose 12 times since I purchased it as it was just to fill up car and bike tires and that only happened infrequently. When I reached out to GreatCircles, they determined that the 1 year warranty had expired less than a month ago so there was nothing they could do. I can't recommend anyone buy this as it should not have failed and for it to fail days after the warranty ended just adds frustration to the whole situation.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2002

customer_reviews.title: Hose Guide Broke After Very Little Use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product about 30 times in my home shop and am very careful with it. I even wipe down the hose before retracting it, in order to keep the hose reel clean. Today, while retracting the hose, I heard a piece of metal hit my shop floor. Upon further inspection, I determined that the plastic hose guide had broken, as seen in the photo. The product is less than 2 years old and has had very little use. In my opinion, the guide is a very poor design. Up until now, I was very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic ratchet mechanism that WILL break
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet mechanism is made of plastic not worthy of a Chinese water pistol. Mine broke after just a few gentle home uses. Don't buy it. Read the reviews. It WILL break, it's just a matter of before or after the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: val2lay

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this June 2017, it is Mar 2019 ...so less than 2 years. I have this mounted in my garage, use it occasionally for airing up tires, cleaning off dust, etc.. I estimate I use it about 2x/month. The brake mechanism to allow the hose to stop retracting has broken -- it is in constant retraction mode which makes it difficult to use as you are fighting it the whole time. Would expect something to last longer than that...very disappointing. No info on warranty on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Rlee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, Awesome Company
customer_reviews.text: I am a farmer and we use this air hose 3 to "a-bagillion" times a day. We rely on it continuously through our hot summers and cold winters. We had a slight issue with our first reel, contacted the company, and they sent a replacement ASAP no questions asked (except for what address do you want us to send it to). I won't hesitate to buy this product again. The only things I think they could improve upon is making a 100' product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Update 8/2019
customer_reviews.text: Had worked great since I bought it in December if 2017. This morning I went to use it and the hose won't lock when I pull it out. So basically it's useless now unless I get a person to hold it to prevent it from retracting and whipping around and possible injuring me or breaking something. Update 8/2019. Seller contacted me after product had failed to retract. Seller shipped new product to me free of charge to replace defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, better than expected, so far.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. hose is rubber feeling, but seems thinner and more flexible. No leaks and hefty feel to retract unit and spring. Easy to mount. Remove 2 screws to remove the bracket, mount the bracket, then re-attach it to the body of the unit. It is wide and will not swing the full 180 unless mounted with a significant gap between it and wall / ceiling. Retract mechanism works great as does the hose aligner, even when under full air pressure. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose but the stopping mechanism does not hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice hose but the stopping mechanism does not hold the hose when the entire hose is pulled out. Have to use a screwdriver to hold it from retracting.
customer_reviews.author: akrguy

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like hose reel. Installation was easy, similar to other retracting reels I had installed previously in my garage. It is well built and looks sturdy. The 50' get me anywhere I need it. The only little flaw is the stopper for the retracting mechanism. It often takes a few pulls before it engages, definitely not as flawless as my other products (2 garden hoses + 1 power cord). I hope it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Quick customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped reeling after 1 month. Customer service responded to my email quickly. In process of a replacement now. Until it broke, it was working great! Good quality hose. Update: got the replacement. High hopes for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: This item rocks. I cheaped out at first and bought a HF version, spent time drilling through thick metal on my lift to install it.... the HF broke with first two unspooling. I mounted this device easily by salvaging the HF frame already bolted to my lift, and some angle iron from HD. One tip, unscrewing two screws releases the mount bracket from spool to facilitate mounting .
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lipowich

customer_reviews.title: For plants only, anything else, you'll be disappointed big time by the pressure
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this unless you need to water plants only, then it's ok. The pressure really sucks bad, so I had to disconnect it and reinstall my hose that was all over the place. I couldn't clean my deck with drips of water.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed so far with this reel. The quality is way beyond the price and the retraction mechanism is very easy to use and seems to be very strong and reliable. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: C Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Works well for residential use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be reasonably well made and the quality is sufficient for the residential user. While I do not believe it would hold up if used a lot the quality fits the price point and intended use. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BDY 006

customer_reviews.title: feels like a standard lock when pulling hose out
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to get it. Guided auto retract, hose has a tough feel, feels like a standard lock when pulling hose out. The lead hose coming out could be longer. I had to buy another lead just to reach, so instead of a 3ft lead plus this I had to buy a 6 ft to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Hose storage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Retracts very nicely with the guide. Much nicer to have hose stored this way , no more lying all over the floor , or hung over stuff. Good quality. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brule Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Just after warranty period of 24 months, it will not lock anymore. No one to call to see how to reset that I have found yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: Great reel with auto-guide
customer_reviews.text: Got this on prime day for $90. This thing has been great in the garage. No need to worry about guiding the hose when winding it back up with the auto-feed. Might get a second for the race trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It broke at 2 year
customer_reviews.text: Had mine since December 2017 and it looks like it recently stopped locking. Meaning it will retract but it won't stop so we just use a clip to keep it from retracting back in
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Its didnt work  , right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I dont know i haven't got a chance to use it it broke!!!! I just olen the box , because I order it but it didn't open it until. My shed was built ... wow I wouldn't think. They would sell a broken one , but who know why I got one that don't work...
customer_reviews.author: james c.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have probably only used it less than 20 times and now it will not stop. I have to put a vise on the hose to keep it from feeling back in.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond T. Jentz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 star but the hardware sent with it are bolts. Not sure where can use these but had to purchase wood lag screws to mount in my garage to a wood beam.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my brother. He loves this hose reel. He’s has had it mounted inside the door of his storage building for nearly a year. It has held up very nicely with frequent use. Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: blowing off parts) it is working fine. Don't expect to pay this little and use ...
customer_reviews.text: It is alright for my garage, I would not put it in a professional shop. For what I am using it for (airing up tires, blowing off parts) it is working fine. Don't expect to pay this little and use it for years and years every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DuVall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: The reel quit working after 6 months & when I contacted the Company, they had a solution the next day. Excellent customer service & I will be getting everything I need in the shop from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: David M. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the auto retractable slide is nice so you don't have to worry about the hose bulking up on one side or the other preventing it to fully retract. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Retract system failed after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: The unit was great to use but doesn't last, worse than other cheaper unit bought about the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Keng H. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased one of these years ago. Professional quality. I know, because I was a motorcycle mechanic for 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Verne Herz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Once installed, this device allowed mobility of air compression hose to every location needed. The retractable feature is very convenient, allows clutter free storage in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Install was a little funky as it was hard to mark wall for anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Jiffy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and set up. I haven’t had a chance to use it much but the quality seems to be there for the price point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these And the retractable reel stopped working very shortly after I bought them. When they did work they would whip back in by them selves. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Very Bad
customer_reviews.text: I loved while it worked. Just 9 months of use and both of my units started leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Eliu Albelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, bought this air hose reel as the “Deal of the Day”
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for my garage, my wife even commented about how it looks. Just installed it so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong and easy
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it on a wall in my garage, seems to be working as it should. I like the mechanism that organizes the hose as it feels back in, great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one as it was damaged it shipping but the 2nd one I received was good. Works great and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: andy peterson

customer_reviews.title: great. Can't say enough good about this one
customer_reviews.text: great. Can't say enough good about this one. retracts as it should
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it but could have bought the same thing at TSC for $20 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bough for 49$ , second 79$, and now 82, surprise surprise
customer_reviews.author: Gedrus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this reel, work's perfect , Good Quality !
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good hose
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much my only concern is it is hard to get it to stop in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Seems we’ll built, time will tell. Need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems we’ll built, time will tell. Need to come up with a detachable mounting bracket to make it easier on the install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome if you don't want to deal with hoses all over your floors.
customer_reviews.author: Dima P.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Hose Reel
customer_reviews.text: The Retractable Air Hose Reel is great. I was tired of stringing out air hose and then having to rewind them ending up with dirty grimy hands. No more ! This hose reel is very well made and the price is very good. I am seriously thinking of purchasing a second reel. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Finally! This prevents me from dragging around my pancake compressor just to put air in my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: I just love it, works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these , I just love it , works great .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Could have supplied better hardware to mount, but other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: mackfoo

customer_reviews.title: hose reel didn't lock in place so I returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: hose reel didn't lock in place so I returned it... other than that, this reel appeared to be decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: ModernMunitions

customer_reviews.title: Easy hose reel
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the easiest working reels I have ever bought. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Geo Jetson

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose reel. Works well in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Winder is very good. Keeps hose from bunching up on one end. Use hose in my cold garage. Hose stays soft and pliable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one day of use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one day of use. Is constantly retracting and I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Sievert

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price. Works great. Easy to hang and the hose retracts effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. Kind of a PITA to mount on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Info

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Super nice wish you could lock the mount so it doesn't always swing side to side
customer_reviews.author: Joe Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic. I should have bought one years ago
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. I should have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: TimmyH

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how this had a five Star rating. Mine spewed air from inside the the hose reel cover. Of course I discovered this after I mounted it and put the fittings on. What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark & Bunny B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a winner!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The reel seems durable and ratchet return mechanism worgs great. The hose appears to be high quality and is very flexible for 3/8 hose. Bigger than I thought it would be but not a problem just a comment.
customer_reviews.author: GeeFuzzy

product_meta.title: REELWORKS Air Hose Reel Retractable Spring Driven Polypropylene Heavy Duty Industrial 3/8" x 50 FT Long Premium Commercial Flex Hybrid Polymer Hose MAX 300psi for Air Compressor/Water
product_meta.description: THE GREAT CIRCLE ADVANTAGE - Partner with us & join millions worldwide who use our cutting edge equipment & technology to empower their everyday lives. SPECIFICATIONS - This Reelworks Hose Reel is constructed of hard impact light weight durable Polypropylene Enclosed Spring Driven Case, a newly designed swivel hose inlet connection protecting against leaks & Premium Commercial Hybrid Flex Polymer Hose material. Our hybrid polymer hose has a working pressure of 300PSI / 20BAR with 1/4" MNPT connections, also including a Lead-in Hose, Adjustable Cable Stopper. Our Air Hose Reels our suitable for both air & water usage. EFFICIENT DESIGN - This Hose Reel uses double adjustment improved ratcheting to lock the hose at any desired length. The Automatic Guide System, retracts the hose orderly way w/ no pile up. Premium Commercial Hybrid Flex Polymer Hose is a blend of Rubber & PVC giving superior bend radius, no memory eliminating kinks, lays flat, Resistant to: Water/Oil, Heat, Ozone, Weather, Abrasion & works in the toughest conditions of -4°F to 140°F (-20°C to 60°C), for the best advantage to suit your needs. SAFETY & PROPER USE - Our Hose Reels are OSHA, RoHS, ISO: 9001, 14001, CNAS, SQC, IAF, Listed approved & certified, including cull quality tested. Reelworks Reels are best suited for indoor/outdoor use, night or day environments, for DIY or industrial applications, allowing for extension to be up out of the way keeping the workplace safe. COMMITMENT - Reelworks is the only authorized seller of Reelworks products, we are committed to providing customers with a stress-free shopping experience. Buy with confidence, we are ALWAYS here to help.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
